title: [Samsung Electronics] Anomaly Detection for Kitchen Robot–Equipment Systems
description: Developed a multimodal anomaly detection model based on log and video data; Designed a predictive maintenance framework leveraging early anomaly indicators

title: [Samsung Electronics] Agile Equipment/Process Quality Anomaly Detection
description: Explored methodologies for analysing FDC and measurement data; Designed algorithms for quality anomaly detection and quantifying equipment operation quality

title: [Hyundai] Qualitative Evaluation Prediction Based on a Data Framework
description: Predicted door opening/closing affective scores from quantitative data; Developed algorithm using spectrum images; Built UI-based tool for simplified workflow

title: [LG Innotek] Multi-Modal Learning with Tabular and Image
description: Developed a Multi-Modal Learning model for heterogeneous data; Applied image–tabular multi-modal learning for cumulative pitch prediction

title: [Samsung S.LSI] Active Learning–based Defect Data Labelling Framework
description: Developed technique to acquire minimised labelled data for detecting new defect types; Designed query strategy algorithm with uncertainty and diversity

title: [NIA & Bflysoft] Fake News Detection
description: Developed fake news detection models for title-content consistency and within-content consistency

title: [Kakao Bank] Touch Dynamics on Random PIN Pad
description: Developed user characteristics classification model using dynamics data; Proposed normalizing flow-based user authentication model

title: [Hanwha System/ICT] Model Development for Predictive Preservation Platform
description: Established data-based predictive maintenance system; Built detection system using Isolation Forest for fault diagnosis

title: [SNUBH] AI for Medical Imaging
description: Study on brain neurological diseases through machine learning; Developed models for moyamoya disease and intracranial aneurysm risk prediction
